m_szDocTitle: Patent US6491789 - Fibril composite electrode for electrochemical capacitors - Google Patents
m_szDocSumamry: Fibril composite electrode for electrochemical capacitors US 6491789 B2 Abstract Composite electrodes including carbon nanofibers (fibrils) and an electrochemically active material are provided for use in electrochemical capacitors. The fibril composite electrodes exhibit high conductivity, improved efficiency of active materials, high stability, easy processing, and increase the performance of the capacitor. A method for producing the composite electrodes for use in electrochemical capacitors is also provided. Images(2) What is claimed is: 1. A process for preparing a composite electrode incl
